meta.title: Caillou moves away from his dad

ttsdata.text: Man, I can't stand living with my dad. He always grounds me and I am sick of it. I got to find away to have freedom.
I know, I will go to happyland. Which is a place where parents can't go to.
YAY YAY YAY YAY YAY YAY YAY YAY YAY YAY YAY YAY YAY YAY YAY YAY YAY YAY YAY YAY YAY YAY YAY YAY
I got to leave now. They can give me what ever I want.
Stop it, caillou. Where do you think you're going?
I am going to happyland, because you always ground me and I am sick of it.
No you're not. You are coming home with me now.
No. I am leaving now. Besides I am almost to the train station.
YAY. I made it. And the train to happyland is here. YAY YAY YAY YAY YAY YAY YAY YAY YAY YAY YAY YAY YAY.
Now to get on the train before dad gets here.
Oh no. I was too late. Caillou already left. NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO. WAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAa
I did it. No more being grounded from my dad. YAY YAY YAY YAY YAY YAY
NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO. I loved grounding my son. If he ever comes back. He is grounded. WAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA
I did it. No more being tortured or grounded by my dad. I won't have no more punishment days. I finally found freedom. YAY YAY YAY YAY YAY YAY YAY YAY YAY YAY YAY YAY YAY YAY YAY
